Publications.Name: Fairness in Student Allocation and Group Formation
Publications.Description: Matthew Forshaw, Cristina Adriana Alexadru, Caitlin Bentley, Vladimiro González-Zelaya, Joseph Kwame Adjei, Vangel Ajanovski, Mireilla Bikanga Ada, Julian Brooks, Joshua Burridge, Alex Chao, Rutwa Engineer, Olga Glebova, Tasmina Islam, Mitsuka Kiyohara, Shao-Heng Ko, Ellert Smári Kristbergsson, Svetlana Peltsverger, Seán Russell, Maíra Marques Samary, Merel Steenbergen, and Carolin Wortmann. 2025. Fairness in Student Allocation and Group Formation. In Proceedings of the 30th ACM Conference on Innovation and Technology in Computer Science Education V. 2 (ITiCSE 2025). Association for Computing Machinery, New York, NY, USA, 699–700.

Publications.Name: Satisfactory for All: Supporting Mastery Learning with Human-in-the-loop Assessments in a Discrete Math Course
Publications.Description: Shao-Heng Ko, Alex Chao, and Violet Pang. 2025. Satisfactory for All: Supporting Mastery Learning with Human-in-the-loop Assessments in a Discrete Math Course. In Proceedings of the 56th ACM Technical Symposium on Computer Science Education V. 1 (SIGCSETS 2025). Association for Computing Machinery, New York, NY, USA, 589–595.
